sentences.en: Andrew roared with delight when he heard Rachel's nickname for the baby.
sentences.cn: 安德鲁听到雷切尔给婴儿起的绰号时，不禁高兴得大笑起来。

sentences.en: Chris takes great delight in teasing his sister.
sentences.cn: 克里斯以取笑妹妹为乐。

sentences.en: Good day to you, Bernard! It's a positive delight to see you.
sentences.cn: 你好，伯纳德！见到你真高兴。

sentences.en: He is delighting audiences with his wit and humour.
sentences.cn: 他在用自己的智慧和幽默娱乐观众。

sentences.en: Her fabulous recipes will delight anyone who loves chocolate.
sentences.cn: 她那些绝妙的配方将使每一个爱吃巧克力的人感到愉悦。

sentences.en: His letters, like his poetry, are life-enhancing and a delight.
sentences.cn: 他的信跟他的诗一样，读来令生活更添滋味，可谓一大乐事。

sentences.en: His music is sheer delight.
sentences.cn: 听他的音乐完全是一种享受。

sentences.en: His sunken eyes glistened with delight.
sentences.cn: 他凹陷的眼睛闪现出喜悦的光芒。

sentences.en: I enjoy seeing your parents take such a delight in the boys.
sentences.cn: 看到你父母如此喜欢这些男孩子，我很高兴。

sentences.en: I grinned at him in unashamed delight.
sentences.cn: 我高兴地朝他笑了笑，一点也不觉得难为情。

sentences.en: Jennifer squealed with delight and hugged me.
sentences.cn: 珍妮弗高兴地尖叫起来，然后拥抱了我。

sentences.en: Mr Bowles could engender delight in students and musicians alike.
sentences.cn: 鲍尔斯先生能够让学生和音乐家都感到快乐。

sentences.en: Psychotherapists often take a perverse delight in criticizing other psychotherapists.
sentences.cn: 精神治疗师们经常幸灾乐祸地批评自己的同行。

sentences.en: She was crowing with delight.
sentences.cn: 她欢呼雀跃。

sentences.en: She whoops with delight at a promise of money.
sentences.cn: 她因为有可能获得一笔钱而高兴得大叫。

sentences.en: Some of their football was breathtaking, a delight to watch.
sentences.cn: 他们踢的一些比赛非常精彩，极具观赏性。

sentences.en: The British team did not disguise their delight at their success.
sentences.cn: 英国队毫不掩饰他们获胜的喜悦。

sentences.en: The kids were screaming with delight.
sentences.cn: 孩子们在高兴地尖叫。

sentences.en: Throughout the house, the views are a constant source of surprise and delight.
sentences.cn: 整个房子，目之所及不停带来惊奇和欣喜。

sentences.en: To my great delight, it worked perfectly.
sentences.cn: 让我非常高兴的是，它的效果奇佳。
